description:
Search the EAN-Search.org database for products by barcode (GTIN, UPC, EAN, ISBN) or keywords.
This is the official MCP for EAN-Search.org.

capabilities.name: lookup_product
capabilities.description:
Lookup the product for an EAN, GTIN, ISBN or UPC barcode.

        Args:
            ean: barcode

capabilities.name: find_products
capabilities.description:
Find products (and their barcode) matching these keywords.

        Args:
            keywords: keywords to search for
